task.summary: Created Store, set to default. Nothing else.
Adjusted application.html.erb. About to rename application.css
Added cart functionality. Proper display. Delete cart.
Cart displayed in side bar on main page. No redirect_to cart page.
Added Ajax funtionality to the store page, which will update and refresh the cart within the browser.
Added green flash to Ajax updated cart on main page.
Tried to add blinds functionality (does not work with tables, contrary to what the book says). Hides empty cart. Does not flash when cart is emptied.
F5: Clicking images adds item to cart.
Iteration G1 complete. Orders can be processed. All tests pass.
Task G complete: Added Atom support.
